title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry the pancetta in a large pan until crispy. Add minced garlic and cook for 1 minute.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat.
Pour egg mixture over pasta and toss quickly, adding pasta water as needed for creaminess.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka paste for at least 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions until soft. Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Stir in remaining tikka paste and cook for 2 minutes.
Add canned tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Return chicken to the pan and simmer for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly on the dough, leaving a border for the crust.
Tear mozzarella and distribute over the sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Remove from oven and add fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with more olive oil if desired. Serve hot.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: Aromatic green curry with coconut milk, vegetables, and tender chicken.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add green curry paste and cook for 2 minutes until fragrant.
Pour in half the coconut milk and stir well.
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink, about 8 minutes.
Add remaining coconut milk, green beans, bell pepper, and eggplant.
Add kaffir lime leaves, fish sauce, and brown sugar.
Simmer for 15 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Taste and adjust seasoning. Garnish with fresh Thai basil.
Serve over jasmine rice.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh toppings, and warm tortillas.
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it into small pieces. Drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and water. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or over a gas flame.
Assemble tacos: place meat on a tortilla and top with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Add a dollop of sour cream and salsa.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with lime wedges.
Serve with additional toppings on the side.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together minced garlic, mustard, lemon juice, and anchovies if using.
Slowly whisk in olive oil until emulsified.
Season dressing with salt and pepper to taste.
In a large bowl, toss romaine lettuce with the dressing.
Top with Parmesan shavings and croutons.
If adding protein, place grilled chicken or shrimp on top.
Serve immediately and enjoy!
